titleStmt.title: The noble souldier. Or, A contract broken, justly reveng'd A tragedy. Written by S.R.
titleStmt.author: Rowley, Samuel, d. 1633?
Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632, attributed name.
Day, John, 1574-1640?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Beale] for Nicholas Vavasour, and are to be sold at his shop in the Temple, neere the Church,

notesStmt.note: S.R. = Samuel Rowley; but often attributed to Thomas Dekker, and possibly revised by him from a work by Rowley. Probably with additions by John Day.
Running title reads: The noble Spanish souldier.

place.placeName: his shop in the Temple, neere the Church
